doc.previous: The present value of the annuity PVA is obtained by simply dividing by
doc.after: Another simple and intuitive way to derive the future value of an annuity is to consider an endowment whose interest is paid as the annuity and whose principal remains constant The principal of this hypothetical endowment can be computed as that whose interest equals the annuity payment amount
